items.translated_title: Apple just named a new AI chief with Google and Microsoft expertise, as John Giannandrea steps down
items.content: His replacement is Amar Subramanya, a highly regarded Microsoft executive who spent 16 years at Google, most recently leading engineering for the Gemini Assistant. It's a savvy hire, given that Subramanya knows the competition intimately.

items.translated_title: One of Google’s biggest AI advantages is what it already knows about you
items.content: The promise is AI that's uniquely helpful because it knows you. But the risk is AI that feels more like surveillance than service.

items.translated_title: MKBHD’s wallpaper app Panels is shutting down
items.content: From the time Brownlee launched Panels in September 2024, the app struggled to find an audience of its own. "We knew it was niche … and ultimately, we weren't able to turn it into the vision I had," Marques Brownlee said.

items.title: OpenAI’s investment into Thrive Holdings is its latest circular deal
items.creator: Rebecca Bellan

items.translated_title: OpenAI’s investment into Thrive Holdings is its latest circular deal

images.alt: Open AI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman speaks during the Kakao media day in Seoul.

items.content: Analysts will be watching to see if Thrive-owned firms actually succeed in building long-term profitable businesses using OpenAI’s tech, or if the result is really just pumped up valuations based on speculative market potential.

items.translated_title: Nvidia’s $2B Synopsys bet tightens its grip on the chip-design stack
items.content: The $2 billion investment in Synopsys, which makes software and components for designing semiconductor chips, deepens their existing partnership at a time when analysts scrutinize circular AI-industry deals and warn of a potential bubble.

items.translated_title: Amazon’s AI chatbot Rufus drove sales on Black Friday
items.content: On Black Friday, Amazon sessions that resulted in a sale were up 100% in the U.S. when the AI chatbot Rufus was used. They only increased by 20% when Rufus wasn't used.
